𒁺 RE₆/GIN > 𒁼 origin gene 𒁺 gin ≈ 𒄀 gin₆ 𒂷 g̃e₂₆ g̃en come, go, move about 𒁺 ĝen gehn gehen "go" 𒈠 ma march 𒁺 ĝen gehen 𒁺 GUB <> Gerenne REⁿ run: 𒁺 ĝen <> 𒄑𒄀;𒄑𒍻𒂗;𒄑𒍻𒂗𒄀;𒄑𒍻𒂗𒍻𒂗 ĝeš-gen6;ĝeš-ge-en;ĝeš-ge-en-gen6;ĝeš-ge-en-ge-en "limbs" 𒁺 gub left •limb 𒆏 2. 𒁺 du:kin ڊڪڻ ḍukaṇu डुकणु "run" 𒁺 DU:kin ঢোকা ḍhōka to go into, to enter, to come into take to 𒁺 DU do téigh 𒄿𒋾 i-ti 𒄿𒄿𒀀𒀜𒋫 i-ya-at-ta iet eiti (go,walk,iterate) (Luwian,Lithuanian) ⇔ 𓊄 track turn 𒁺 DU 𒁲 DE DI 𒁺𒁺 don 𒁻 take "bring" 𒍏 𒁾 dab6 dub 𒁺 dar in 𒌑𒌋𒌋𒁺 šam-man-dar šamandar شَمَنْدَر 𒌑𒄢𒁯 u₂ sumun-dar 𒌑𒇰𒊬𒊬 sumundar "beetroot" 𒁺 dar darr@Dravidian drome in dromedar 🐫 𒁲𒁉𒀉 ti-bi-id тибе tibe > deve "camel"(toe) 𒁺 dar •tar trab treib drive
